Code: MASTIC Brand: Yogamatters Product Weight: 1.4kg Mat Thickness: 4.5mm Sustainability: STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® Certificate Number TP025 122612 TESTEX Made In: Taiwan Made From: High grade PVC (AZO, DOP, phthalate and latex free) Suitable For: All styles of yoga Care Instructions: Spray mat with Yogamatters Yoga Mat Cleaner and wipe down with a damp cloth. Roll mat once dry and store away from direct sunlight. 183cm x 61cm
